column5: Shenzhen: The Director of China Ocean Fisheries Holding Co. Ltd Liu Rong Sheng during a meeting with Veng Sakhon
column6: Minister of Agriculture and Fisheries on April 15
column9: discussed raising fish species in Cambodia.------ Mr. Liu Rong Sheng talked about the aquaculture chain in Cambodia
column10: including the production of fish feed
column12: packing and storage for local distribution and export. His company wants to raise the farming of fish in Cambodia.------HE Veng Sakhon
column14: urged the company to cooperate with the administration and conduct environmental impact assessments as soon as possible to request authorization from the government.
